flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
両腕の　ツメは　自動車を
スクラップにする　破壊力。
ツメの　先から　毒を　出す。

It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap
of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

Con le zampe può accartocciare una macchina.
Le punte degli artigli sono velenose.

Sus brazos tienen fuerza para destrozar un coche. La punta
de sus zarpas segrega veneno.

In seinen Armen steckt so viel Kraft, dass es mit seinen
giftigen Krallen Autos zerquetschen kann.

Il peut réduire une voiture en pièces avec ses pinces.
Le bout de ses pinces contient du poison.

양팔의 발톱은 자동차를
동강 내는 파괴력이 있다.
발톱의 끝에서 독을 뿌린다.

りょううでの　ツメは　じどうしゃを
スクラップにする　はかいりょく。
ツメの　さきから　どくを　だす。

自慢の　パワーで　相手を
ばらばらに　できるのに　さらに
猛毒で　とどめを　刺すのだ。

It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can
tear foes apart, it finishes them off with
powerful poison.

Va fiero della sua forza con cui può fare a pezzi il nemico,
ma in genere preferisce finirlo usando le sue tossine.

Aunque sabe que puede aplastar al rival con su gran fuerza,
le gusta dar el golpe de gracia con su virulento veneno.

Es bringt seine Gegner mit starkem Gift zur Strecke, obwohl es
weiß, dass es stark genug ist, um sie zu zerfetzen.

Il met ses adversaires en pièces grâce à sa prodigieuse force,
puis donne le coup de grâce avec son violent poison.

자랑거리인 파워로 상대를
조각조각 낼 수 있으며 게다가
맹독으로 마무리한다.

じまんの　パワーで　あいてを
ばらばらに　できるのに　さらに
もうどくで　とどめを　さすのだ。

両腕の　ツメは　自動車を
スクラップにする　破壊力。
ツメの　先から　毒を　出す。

It takes pride in its strength.
Even though it can tear foes apart,
it finishes them off with powerful poison.

It takes pride in its strength.
Even though it can tear foes apart,
it finishes them off with powerful poison.

Possessing a sturdy build, it takes
pride in its strength, taking down
foes without using toxins.

Fier et robuste, il met un point
d’honneur à battre ses adversaires
sans utiliser de poison.

Possessing a sturdy build, it takes
pride in its strength, taking down
foes without using toxins.

Fier et robuste, il met un point
d’honneur à battre ses adversaires
sans utiliser de poison.

It attacks people and Pokémon that
cross the desert. This has only
furthered its bad reputation.

It attacks people and Pokémon that
cross the desert. This has only
furthered its bad reputation.

Possessing a sturdy build, it takes
pride in its strength, taking down
foes without using toxins.

Its body is encased in a sturdy
shell. Its head rotates 180
degrees, eliminating blind spots.

It has the power in its clawed
arms to make scrap of a car. The
tips of its claws release poison.
